pageContext.claim: “As you know, President Obama was given information just prior to the election -- last election, 2016 -- and they decided not to do anything about it. The reason they decided that was pretty obvious to all: They thought Hillary Clinton was going to win the election, and they didn't think it was a big deal. When I won the election, they thought it was a very big deal. And all of the sudden they went into action, but it was a little bit late.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump implies that Russian actions only happened because Obama was negligent in some way and that it won't happen under his administration. Russian operatives have already attempted to hack Democratic campaigns in the midterm elections. Plus, Obama made several attempts to stop Russia's meddling including speaking directly to Putin in the fall of 2016.
